channel.title: Shops problem, items aren't going into shop?
channel.description:
In my shops.CFG I've added all the rares(Not custom) I also added bunny ears & santa but those are the only two that actually show, so I've used tabs for those but like redphat,yellow phat, green phat etc, green mask,red mask, and blue mask don't show for some reason, I know I used tabs for them
[code]shop = 42 Rares_Shop 1 1 1050 1 1037 1 1038 1 1040 1 1042 1 1044 1 1046 1 1048 1 1053 1 [/code]

item.title: Shops problem, items aren't going into shop?
item.dc:creator: @Cuban0_Ftw Cuban0 Ftw
item.description:
@Cuban0_Ftw wrote:

What about this

shop = 42	Rares_Shop				1	1	1050	1	1037	1	1038	1	1040	1	1042	1	1044	1	1046	1	1048	1	1053	1058	1	1055	1	1057	1

I’ve added 2 more masks in and it comes out to be a sheild in the shops, wtf?
